name: memcached-encoding-fork
author: Avinash Verma, original Author : Arnout Kazemier
description: Warning : Will be deprecated when original memcached authors add encoding support. Fork of Arnout Kazemier's memcached, A fully featured Memcached API client, supporting both single and clustered Memcached servers through consistent hashing and failover/failure. Memcached is rewrite of nMemcached, which will be deprecated in the near future.
